name: Cultist
description:
Each turn you have a few cultists that you will be able to send all over the world to pray the Greats Old One. Each location is dedicated to a specific god and you’ll have to way to please your god : A/ For each cultist you sent you add 20% to succeed your pray to this god or B/ Each cultist add only 10% to succeed but you’ll have 50% chance for each cultist you sent to see him come back next turn.

If you succeed to reach 5 to the satisfaction gauge he will blessed your with a bonus as long as you stay at this point. In the meantime if you reach 0 you’ll have to face the cursed he will tear down.

Oh.. and don’t forget to feed the insatiable desire of sacrifice of Azathoth. As long as you feed him you’ll be ok but.. He will destroy the world if you don’t.
